name: inline-types
description: A Visual Studio Code extension to render inferred types in TypeScript documents.
author: Martin Johns

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run clean && npm install && npm run compile

inlineTypes.features.variableType.description: Render the type of variables (unless they're functions).

inlineTypes.features.functionVariableTyp.description: Render the type of variables even when they're functions.

inlineTypes.features.functionReturnType.description: Render the return type of functions.

inlineTypes.features.functionParameterTy.description: Render the type of function parameters.

inlineTypes.features.objectPatternType.description: Render the type of properties in object pattern.

inlineTypes.features.arrayPatternType.description: Render the type of items in array pattern.

inlineTypes.features.objectLiteralType.description: Render the type of items in object literals.

inlineTypes.features.parameterName.description: Render the names of parameters in function calls.

inlineTypes.features.highlightAny.description: Render an inferred 'any' type with a warning color.

inlineTypes.updateDelay.description: A delay for propagating decoration updates to the editor in milliseconds.

inlineTypes.lightThemeDecorationStyle.op.description: Opacity used for the decoration in light theme.

inlineTypes.lightThemeDecorationStyle.co.description: The color used for the decoration in light theme.

inlineTypes.lightThemeDecorationStyle.wa.description: The color used for warning decorations in light theme.

inlineTypes.darkThemeDecorationStyle.opa.description: Opacity used for the decoration in dark theme.

inlineTypes.darkThemeDecorationStyle.col.description: The color used for the decoration in dark theme.

inlineTypes.darkThemeDecorationStyle.war.description: The color used for warning decorations in dark theme.
